text: Vera Elisabeth Telenius (24 September 1912, in Sahalahti – 5 August 1991, in Tampere) was a Finnish singer. Her most successful recording was "Miljoona ruusua" for which she wrote Finnish lyrics for the song "Million alyh roz" originally made famous by Russian singer Alla Pugacheva. Category:Finnish female singers Category:1991 deaths Category:1912 births Category:20th-century Finnish singers Category:20th-century women singers
title: Vera Telenius
